availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

body.p: Livingston County, Kentucky, carpenter. Kentucky native. Married to Sarah Carpenter Stroud. Father of Malinda Stroud, James Stroud, John Stroud, William Stroud, Isaac Martin Stroud, and Thomas Stroud. Carpenter in Livingston County, Kentucky, in 1850. Carpenter in Livingston County in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Livingston County, Smithland, p. 383A.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Livingston County, Smithland, p. 280.
Kentucky Death Certificates, 1911-1965, Kentucky Office of Vital Statistics, KDLA, Frankfort, KY, File 2624.
"James Stroud (1816-1882)," Find A Grave, Memorial 74946367, accessed February 25, 2023, http://www.findagrave.com/memorial/74946367.
